class.rdfs:comment: An intangible item that describes an alignment between a learning resource and a node in an educational framework.
class.rdfs:label: AlignmentObject

schema:alignmentType.rdfs:comment: A category of alignment between the learning resource and the framework node. Recommended values include: 'assesses', 'teaches', 'requires', 'textComplexity', 'readingLevel', 'educationalSubject', and 'educationalLevel'.
schema:alignmentType.rdfs:label: alignmentType

schema:educationalFramework.rdfs:comment: The framework to which the resource being described is aligned.
schema:educationalFramework.rdfs:label: educationalFramework

schema:targetDescription.rdfs:comment: The description of a node in an established educational framework.
schema:targetDescription.rdfs:label: targetDescription

schema:targetName.rdfs:comment: The name of a node in an established educational framework.
schema:targetName.rdfs:label: targetName

schema:targetUrl.rdfs:comment: The URL of a node in an established educational framework.
schema:targetUrl.rdfs:label: targetUrl
